short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates cents per point to better assess points value

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension adds a third currency, "cents per point," below each hotel's cash price on their website to more accurately assess your relative points value when looking for redemptions.

Currently working for the following hotel brands

- Marriott Bonvoy
- Hilton 
- Hyatt

- JetBlue (in progress, not functional yet)
